mapper.select:
/* [arenaDao.xml] searchArena */
select deck_no, of_1_character_id, of_1_star, of_2_character_id, of_2_star, of_3_character_id, of_3_star, of_4_character_id, of_4_star, of_5_character_id, of_5_star, ifnull(reg_nick, '없음') as regNick, date_format(reg_date, '%Y/%m/%d') as regDate from arena_info where 1=1 and df_1_character_id = #{df_1_character_id} and df_2_character_id = #{df_2_character_id} and df_3_character_id = #{df_3_character_id} and df_4_character_id = #{df_4_character_id} and df_5_character_id = #{df_5_character_id} order by reg_date desc
